update.name: qmeta v1.0.5-x86
update.features: Quick Navigation, Search Translation, Surah Index, Tags, qNote Editor

entries.log: Update release for x86 based platform.
Fix issue regarding HTML links inside qNote not propagating outside application.
Fix drag/swipe on search result(s) not hiding soft keyboard.
Replace loading all loading animation with custom css.
Back button now will toggle side menu first, before exiting.
Add small margin on wysisyg editor of qNote to allow scrolling.
